    sparse_vector: {
      field: "ml.tokens",
      inference_id: "my-elser-model",
      query: "How is the weather in Jamaica?",
      prune: true,
      pruning_config: {
        tokens_freq_ratio_threshold: 5,
        tokens_weight_threshold: 0.4,
        only_score_pruned_tokens: false,
      },
    },
  },
  rescore: {
    window_size: 100,

      rescore_query: {
        sparse_vector: {
          field: "ml.tokens",
          inference_id: "my-elser-model",
          query: "How is the weather in Jamaica?",
          prune: true,
